basic.description: Neurotransmitters including acetylcholine, monoamines, excitatory amino acids, GABA, neuroactive peptides, and second messengers and their roles in psychological processes including sensory-perceptual development, motor control, motivated behaviours, learning and memory.  Lecture/seminar (2 hrs)
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Neurotransmitters & Behaviour
